traits.name: Invisible in Water
entries: The big water slurpent is {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in water.

traits.name: Water Bound
entries: The big water slurpent dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

actions.name: Constrict
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, one target. 13 (3d6+3 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13) and pulled 5 feet toward the big water slurpent. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the big water slurpent tries to drown it, and the big water slurpent can't constrict another target.
